item.title: Get insulted by sudo
item.description: Do you know sudo can insult you? wait, what ❓ 😕 Take a look at what I’m talking about. sudo can insult you for typing incorrect password. 💥 Enable insults in sudo Open a terminal and type: $ sudo visudo This should open the configuration file in your default editor. In ubuntu like distros, it will be opened in nano. Now you will have to find the section where the defaults are listed.
